text: Ràdio i Televisió d'Andorra, S.A. (RTVA) (; "Radio and Television of Andorra PLC") is the state-owned public television and radio broadcaster in the Principality of Andorra. It works as a television channel, ATV, and a radio station, RNA, both of which broadcast in Catalan. ==References== Category:1989 establishments in Europe Category:Radio stations in Europe Category:Television stations Category:Organizations based in Andorra Category:State-owned enterprises
title: Ràdio i Televisió d'Andorra
